ComicInfo.Tags: Susie Ingalls,Fawn,Cauchemard,Norman Rockwell,Vincent Van Gogh,Black Flame,Morgana Trace,Hellequin
ComicInfo.Title: Dead Artists & Talking Dinosaurs; Faces in the Abyss!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dead Artists & Talking Dinosaurs: Fawn is altered by a pod that created her. Morgana and Fawn meet the ghosts of famous artists.
Faces in the Abyss!: Susie is assaulted in the Flame's stronghold while she sleeps.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis

ComicInfo.Letterer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Bruce Patterson
